أ ت ي.translation: so that you bring to them
surely, I will come to them
that surely you will bring him to me
And we have come to you
and let him bring to you
and he will come to Us
Then we will surely produce for you
And it will come to them
surely, we will come to them
But it will surely come to them
surely it will come to you
And We gave both of them

أ ث م.translation: But sin of both of them

أ خ ذ.translation: He will call you to account

أ ذ ن.translation: Allah has given permission of it

أ ل ه.translation: gods as a way of approach
Allah will have mercy on them
Allah will pay them in full
And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
Allah has given permission of it
and Allah lets him go astray
and so that Allah may make evident

أ م ر.translation: and surely I will order them
and surely I will order them

أ و ب.translation: to those who often turn (to Him)

ب ت ك.translation: so they will surely cut off

ب د ل.translation: and surely He will change for them

ب ص ر.translation: They will be made to see each other

ب ل و.translation: And surely We will test you
so that He may test you
And surely We will test you
so that He may test you

ب و أ.translation: surely We will give them position
surely We will give them a place

ب ي ت.translation: surely, we will attack him by night

ب ي ن.translation: and that We (may) make it clear
so that he might make clear

ت ب ع.translation: And We caused to follow them

ت ر ف.translation: while We had given them luxury

ث ب ط.translation: so He made them lag behind
